department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase of a hoof trim chute, delivery, and training for the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada.
description: The department is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a hoof trim chute including delivery and training located in Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada.
duration_in_months: The duration of this procurement will last from the posting date until the contract is awarded and signed.
full_summary:
### Tender Number  :# WS4474211430 
### Solicitation Number # WS4474211430
### Contract Title: Acquisition of Hoof Trim Chute

#### Tender Details
- **Publication Date**: April 5, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: April 30, 2024 @ 2:00 PM
- **Expected Start Date**: None
- **Expected End Date**: None 

#### Tender Status
- **Expiration Date**: Expiring
- **Closes**: Expiring

#### Procurement Information
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements**: [Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)](https://www.international.gc.ca/trade-commerce/trade-agreements-accords-commercialiaux/cta-aec/index.aspx?lang=eng&page=introduction)
- **Procurement Category**: Minerals and Mining

#### Contract Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC), is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a hoof trim chute including delivery and training. The equipment is to be delivered to the City of Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada. 

#### Invitation to Tender
Download the RFP documents from the following link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19321095?extsite=MTkzMjEwOTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. Interested parties must submit their proposals to the procurement email address at [efoe.adjakly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:efoe.adjakly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Important Dates
- **RFP Issuance Date**: April 5, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: April 30, 2024

#### Contact Information
- **Procurement Officer**: Adjakly, Efoë (He/Him)
- **Email Address**: [efoe.adjakly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:efoe.adjakly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: Not available Currently. the opportunity
- **Governing Body**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (Canada)
